title: Xray Test Count Extractor
description: Extracts test counts from Xray Cloud using dynamic parameters per row.

#xray_client_id.title: Xray Client ID:
#xray_client_id.description: Your Xray Cloud Client ID for API authentication. Obtain this from Xray Cloud security settings.

#xray_client_secret.title: Xray Client Secret:
#xray_client_secret.description: Your Xray Cloud Client Secret for API authentication. Obtain this from Xray Cloud security settings.

input_column_name.title: Input Column Name:
input_column_name.description: Name of the column containing JSON array with parameters: ["project_id", "folder_path", "jql_query"]. Empty strings for optional parameters.

output_column_name.title: Output Column Name:
output_column_name.description: Name of the column where test counts will be stored. Contains numeric values or error messages.

incremental.title: Incremental Load Enabled:
incremental.description: If true, output data will be loaded incrementally. Set to false for full table replace.

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging:
debug.description: If true, enables verbose debug logging in the job output.
